tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE project_milestones (
    milestone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    milestone_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    project_id INT NOT NULL,
    timeline_id INT NOT NULL,
    milestone_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE project_timelines (
    timeline_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    milestone_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE project_timelines (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	timeline_date TIMESTAMP,
	current_progress INT,
	project_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES project_milestones(id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_teams (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	team_name VARCHAR,
	team_lead VARCHAR,
	project_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES project_milestones(id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_progress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    milestone_id INT,
    progress_status TEXT,
    progress_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE project_team (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    team_name TEXT,
    team_lead TEXT,
    team_members TEXT
);
